title: 60 fps doesent feel like it
body: Hello. In general, while playing, i get arround 100-150 fps on max settings, but it doesent feel so smooth. If i cap the fps at 60, it'll be 60 or 59 fps, but its not so smooth. Im seeing videos on ytb with ppl playing on 60 fps but it doesent feel everywhere near it. Any idea why or a solution?

replies.body: I vaguely remember having this issue back when I first built this computer. I couldn't play uncapped or I got massive screen tearing, but if I capped at 60 fps the game felt super sluggish. I can't remember if it was a vsync problem, but now I just cap it at 120 fps and it feels fine.

Define "smooth"?

What is your monitor refresh rate, and what are you seeing that looks wrong? flickering/screentear? input delay? movement delay?
